name: Zack's 4D World
description:
WASD to move

Mouse to aim camera

press CTRL+A to switch from my minecraft controls to the normal minecraft controls.

Breaking, Placing and going down in mid air depend on the control scheme you're using. (press CTRL+A to toggle between the two)

CTRL+S to save

CTRL+L to load

CTRL+T to toggle selector tool

e to toggle flying

space to jump or fly upwards

Scroll wheel or arrow keys to change item

Mouse special buttons to go through W, or use arrow keys
